text: usake rakshak (paharedaar) usake apane aage aur peechhe lage hote hain jo allaah ke aadesh se usakee raksha karate hai. kisee qaum ke logon ko jo kuchh praapt hota hai allaah use badalata nahin, jab tak ki ve svayan apane aapako na badal daalen. aur jab allaah kisee qaum ka anisht chaahata hai to phir vah usase tal nahin sakata, aur usase hatakar unaka koee samarthak aur sanrakshak bhee nahin
